info.name: ThinkingCities APIs Basic Ops
info.description:
A set with the basic API operations used by ThikingCities platform, covering:

* IDM & Auth
* Orion Context Broker
* STH
* Perseo CEP
* CKAN

item.name: Create rule Lamp Alarm HTTP POST
Create rule MatchRecognize (3 fails in the same area)
Create rule _Timer. Same precise minute in every hour
